          <area>
             <cardcollection id=0 playable="false" style="layout">
                <card id=12 status="faceup" />
             </cardcollection>
             <cardcollection id=2 playable="false" style="layout">
                <card id=16 status="faceup" />
             </cardcollection>
             <chips>
                <chip guid="4jklrjklfu4jnkfu8943runf" value="50" color="blue" />
                <chip guid="d34jhdf7f45jkljf894lkfhd" value="20" color="red" />
                <chip guid="jkl98dfjr4jnkf89fj3udjdl" value="10" color="green" />

<chips>

= Card Collection =

Playable: true or false if the pile of cards can be "edited".  The piles of cards that can be moved or modified.

Style: layout (displays cards for players to see), deck (where cards are drawn from), discard, hand
{{{
<cardcollection playable="true" style="hand">
   <card id=4 status="hidden" />
   <card id=12 status="faceup" />
   <card id=40 status="facedown" />
</cardcollection>
}}}

= Commands =
Commands sent from the table to the server

<action table="1">
   <command action="Hit">
      <param name="player" value="1" />
   </command>
<action>
